description: An overview of the ancient synagogue in both Judaea/Palaestina and the Jewish diaspora from its earliest manifestations in the final centuries of the first millennium BCE until the Muslim conquest of the Levant in the 7th century CE. The course focuses on the evidence provided by archaeology, epigraphic finds as well as literary and historical texts.
title: CANCELLED
long_title: The Ancient Synagogue: Archaeology and Texts
